Hahahha! I now have my own "cheese shelf" in the fridge! Most ppl have a drawer in the bedroom/shelf in the bathroom..... not me 😂

@JoannaBlythman I 😍 Welsh faggots! None of this Mr Brains rubbish!
Great!!! Another night wide awake until 7am THEN I fall asleep making me late when I had plans for 9am! Need sum knockout drops! #zombie ☕

@HammondCharcute love that video! 😂
@IL0VEthe80s @gazzaboyo Posting your bacon tomorrow! 😙 DM me post code etc again plz
@gazzaboyo No! ive a luvly day pland if i get any sleep. Farmers Market, gr8 food,Craft beer & finishing on a cheese board. Dont spoil it!😬
@gazzaboyo 😇 I was building character, preparing you for the harsh reality of when you stepped out of ur knitted shorts in2 big boy trousers
